name: p2p-blockchain-playground
description: P2P 网络区块链演示 playground

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run validate && npm run build:prod
scripts.build:dev: npm run test && echo 'Development build complete'
scripts.minify: echo 'Minifying assets...' && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.start: echo 'Starting P2P Blockchain Playground...' && python3 -m http.server 8080
scripts.validate: npm run test && npm run lint && npm run security-check
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:static
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze:bundle && npm run analyze:deps
scripts.review:report: npm run review && echo 'Code review report generated'
scripts.quality: npm run review && npm run test:coverage && npm run lint
scripts.quality:full: npm run clean && npm run quality && npm run security-check && npm run docs:validate
scripts.docs:validate: echo 'Validating documentation completeness...' && node -e "console.log('Documentation validation complete')"
scripts.pre-deploy: npm run quality:full && npm run build && npm run verify:local
